statements: SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_data ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, medical_history, treatment_plan FROM patient_data WHERE medical_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE gender='Male'
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patient_data WHERE DATE(date_of_birth) <= '1990-01-01'
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patient_data WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, medical_history FROM patient_data WHERE medical_history LIKE '%surgery%' LIMIT 5
SELECT CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name, treatment_plan FROM patient_data WHERE treatment_plan IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM MedicalHistory WHERE date_visited >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT record_id, diagnosis, treatment, date_visited FROM MedicalHistory ORDER BY date_visited DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob, address FROM Patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id WHERE MedicalHistory.diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT first_name, last_name, treatment FROM Patients JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id WHERE date_visited BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT first_name, last_name, address, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM demographic_data;
SELECT id, name FROM demographic_data ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT age, gender FROM demographic_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT address FROM demographic_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM medical_history WHERE medications LIKE '%aspirin%';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM demographic_data;
SELECT * FROM medical_history WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM demographic_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, date, treatment_type FROM treatment_information ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM demographic_data JOIN medical_history ON demographic_data.id = medical_history.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Demographic;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM Demographic WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, medications FROM MedicalHistory WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT research_date, research_topic, researcher_name FROM ResearchInfo ORDER BY research_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_type, doctor_name FROM TreatmentInfo WHERE treatment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, gender, address FROM Demographic
SELECT * FROM MedicalHistory WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19'
SELECT * FROM TreatmentInfo WHERE treatment_type = 'Surgery' ORDER BY treatment_date DESC
SELECT patient_id, research_topic FROM ResearchInfo ORDER BY research_date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM Demographic
SELECT * FROM Demographic;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Demographic WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT treatment_description, treatment_date FROM Treatment WHERE patient_id = 2001 ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, medical_condition FROM MedicalHistory WHERE diagnosis_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, clinical_notes FROM ClinicalData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Demographic;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM Demographic WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Demographic ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalHistory JOIN Demographic ON MedicalHistory.patient_id = Demographic.patient_id;
SELECT treatment_id, treatment_description, treatment_date FROM Treatment WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
